item.title: Qi2 Wireless Charging: Everything You Need to Know (2025)
item.description: Qi2 enables faster, more efficient magnetic wireless charging, and it’s finally natively available on a major Android phone.

item.title: The Destruction of NASA Would Be a Blow to Our Collective Imagination
item.description: As NASA grapples with major proposed budget cuts and losing some of its most brilliant minds, America’s willingness to look outward is also at risk.

item.description: Many of the top laptops we recommend are on sale for the back-to-school season.

item.title: Why Did a $10 Billion Startup Let Me Vibe-Code for Them—and Why Did I Love It?
item.description: I spent two days at Notion and saw an industry in upheaval. I also shipped some actual code.

item.title: 21 Best Early Labor Day Sales on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
item.description: Say “hello” to autumn with deals on WIRED-approved fire pits, headphones, tablets, and home office gear.
